name: MeuResumo
tag_list: business, summaries, brazil, brasil, business-summaries, emerging, sao-paulo
overview:
We are experts in summarized (business) b2b content in Brazil. We’re now targeting b2c via web/mobile/tablet to capture the huge growth in online/mobile consumption.

With Brazil’s rapid internet/mobile growth and consumption there is a current lack of business content in Portuguese (when compared to mature markets). Less than 5% of the population can digest English properly. There is also a known educational infrastructure problem. Our mission is to provide access to the best in business knowledge. We’ll do this by summarizing business content in Portuguese and delivering it via web/mobile/tablet platform.

We are experts in summarizing business content for b2b. One of our founding partners has an in depth experience in this field having provided this service to some of Brazil’s largest corporate companies. We understand the field and will be able to execute rapidly.
